title: Couple Relationship Get
description: How to get a couple resource.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gedcomx xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/Couple" id="12345">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/changes" rel="change-history" title="Couple Relationship Change History"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" rel="man" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/notes" rel="notes" title="Couple Relationship Notes"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345" rel="relationship" title="Couple Relationship"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/couple-relationships/12345/source-references" rel="source-references" title="Couple Relationship Source References"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" rel="woman" title="Conclusions"/>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-1" resourceId="pid-1"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid-2" resourceId="pid-2"/>
        <fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Marriage">
            <date>
                <original>June 1800</original>
                <formal>+1800-06</formal>
            </date>
            <place>
                <original>Provo, Utah, Utah, United States</original>
            </place>
        </fact>
    </relationship>
</gedcomx>
